column1: '''Kuduk''' (pl. *'''Kudugin''') was the actual [[Westron]] word with which the [[Hobbits
column2: Hobbit]]s called themselves. It is translated as "Hobbit."

column1: It is suggested that this developed from an older word, ''[[k没d-d没kan]]'', meaning '[[holbytlan
column2: hole-builder]]'. Although the Hobbits called themselves ''kuduk'', they had forgotten the meaning of the word.<ref name="App">{{App
Tolkien]] considered the form ''c没buc'' pl. ''c没bugin'' which was apparently dropped later.<ref>{{HM
